body: Bruh this is his doujin he can do what ever the fuck he want, if he feel like the mask is ok then it's just OK

The stupid fucking mask makes this so much harder to enjoy. Why can’t more guys just A:use bangs, B:just not draw any more facial features than absolutely necessary, or C: Just not show the face at all. This is a Doujin, you have full control over the viewing angles, show the face for story segments and then begone with it !
